title: sammati unakkE
sahitya:
sammati unakkE tandEn ennai nI tazhuvik-koLvAi vEndE en mana


anupallavi

  emmatha vAdiyum ennai mayakkAmal inba sutantrap-paNbuDan en mana


caraNam    Anava serukin kai aghappaTTu vizhikkAmal Ashai pisAcugaL aDiyEnai vaLaikkAmal
kAnAt-tantiramAi kaLLar parikkAmal kaDavuLE unnai nAn kalandu magizhndiDa
